data.name: Fruit Girls 2: The Horny Bard Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
READY FOR SOME SEXY MUSIC?


Enjoy the original soundtrack scored by The Horny Bard for the game Fruit Girls 2: HJPS. This DLC contains all the tracks composed for the base game and for the trailer.
